analysis.key_info: Official court document granting Letters of Trust for the Estate of Dennis W. Rogan under informal administration in Racine County, Wisconsin.
analysis.naming_rationale: The filename adheres to the legal naming convention: [Parties/Subject]_[DocumentType]_[Matter/CaseID]_[Date]. It prominently features the Estate of Rogan as the primary subject, followed by the specific document type ('Letters of Trust'), the critical case number ('24-PR-371'), and the document's filing/signing date. This makes the content immediately clear, scannable, and fits within the character limit while being industry-standard for probate documents.
